假一賠十.definition: lit. if one is fake, I shall compensate you for ten of them; fig. (of goods) 100% genuine

假人.definition: dummy (for crash testing, displaying clothes etc)

假仙.definition: (Tw) to pretend; to put on a false front (from Taiwanese 假仙, Tai-lo pr. [ké-sian])

假令.definition: if; supposing that; acting county magistrate

假借.definition: to make use of; to use sth as pretext; under false pretenses; under the guise of; masquerading as; lenient; tolerant; loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); character acquiring meanings by phonetic association; also called phonetic loan

假借字.definition: loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); character acquiring meanings by phonetic association; also called phonetic loan

假借義.definition: the meaning of a phonetic loan character 假借字[jia3 jie4 zi4] acquired from a similar-sounding word (e.g. 而[er2] originally meant "beard" but acquired the meaning "and")

假充.definition: to pose as sb; to act a part; imposture

假公濟私.definition: official authority used for private interests (idiom); to attain private ends by abusing public position

假冒.definition: to impersonate; to pose as (someone else); to counterfeit; to palm off (a fake as a genuine)

假分數.definition: improper fraction (with numerator ≥ denominator, e.g. seven fifths); see also: proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]

假別.definition: category of leave (maternity leave, sick leave etc)

假名.definition: false name; pseudonym; alias; pen name; the Japanese kana scripts; hiragana 平假名[ping2 jia3 ming2] and katakana 片假名[pian4 jia3 ming2]

假吏.definition: acting magistrate; temporary official (in former times)

假報告.definition: false report; forgery; fabricated declaration (e.g. income tax return)

假定.definition: to assume; to suppose; supposed; so-called; assumption; hypothesis

假寐.definition: to doze; to take a nap; nodding off to sleep

假座.definition: to use as a venue (e.g. use {a restaurant} as the venue {for a farewell party})

假想敵.definition: opposing force (in war games); hypothetical enemy (in strategic studies)

假惺惺.definition: (of an expression of sympathy) insincere; phony

假慈悲.definition: phony mercy; sham benevolence; crocodile tears

假戲真唱.definition: fiction comes true; play-acting that turns into reality

假手.definition: to get (sb else) to perform the task; to rely on (sb else) to do it; prosthetic hand

假手他人.definition: to get one's own task done by sb else

假手於人.definition: (idiom) to get one's own task done by sb else

假托.definition: to pretend; to use a pretext; to make sth up; to pass oneself off as sb else; to make use of

假扮.definition: to impersonate; to act the part of sb; to disguise oneself as sb else

假招子.definition: to put on airs; to adopt a false attitude

假掰.definition: (Tw) affected; pretentious; to put on a display of histrionics (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [ké-pai])

假條.definition: leave of absence request (from work or school); excuse note; CL:張|张[zhang1]

假死.definition: suspended animation; feigned death; to play dead

假洋鬼子.definition: (derog.) wannabe foreigner, a Chinese person who apes the ways of foreigners

假秤.definition: rigged scale (used to deceive customers by displaying incorrect weight)

假聲.definition: falsetto (cf. 真聲|真声[zhen1sheng1], natural or modal voice)

假設.definition: to suppose; to presume; to assume; supposing that ...; if; hypothesis; conjecture

假途滅虢.definition: lit. a short-cut to crush Guo (idiom); fig. to connive with sb to damage a third party, then turn on the partner

假造.definition: to forge; fake; to fabricate (a story)

假道伐虢.definition: to obtain safe passage to conquer the State of Guo; to borrow the resources of an ally to attack a common enemy (idiom)

假面具.definition: mask; fig. false façade; deceptive front

假音.definition: falsetto, same as 假聲|假声

假高音.definition: falsetto, same as 假聲|假声
